review: First and Foremost the device has met my expectations and more, that is easily worht 5 stars - I don't know about longevity and how it will hold up ive only had for a couple months now, wireless works great connected on 5ghz across my house, the reason i am docking off a star i probably should do 2 stars is the menu is so convoluted and cluttered without a way to stream line and hid stuff you dont want without rooting the device..Unless there is away and i just havent figured it out. but the device itsself and operation is great actually gonna order another one and a fire tv.
